GSD.description:
HID: hidraw: fix memory leak in hidraw_release()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.212 by commit 53c7c4d5d40b45c127cb1193bf3e9670f844c3cf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: hidraw: fix memory leak in hidraw_release()
